data.name: Split
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal input_format input_format_options}}
    <split streaming="{{streaming}}" delimiter="{{delimiter}}" parallelProcessing="{{parallel}}">
        <simple>
            {{safe body}}
        </simple>
        {{#if (eq tokenize true)}}
        <tokenize token="{{tokenize_options.token}}" regex="{{tokenize_options.regex}}" xml="{{tokenize_options.xml}}" trim="{{tokenize_options.trim}}" group="{{tokenize_options.group}}"/>
        {{/if}}
        
        {{applyMarshal output_format output_format_options}} 
        {{generateDestination handles.[0].to}}
    </split>
    {{generateDestination handles.[1].to}}
</route>
